name: UPanelWidget
doc: The base class for all UMG panel widgets.  Panel widgets layout a collection of child widgets.

methods.name: AddChild
methods.doc:
Adds a new child widget to the container.  Returns the base slot type,
requires casting to turn it into the type specific to the container.

methods.name: ClearChildren
methods.doc: Remove all child widgets from the panel widget.

methods.name: GetAllChildren
methods.doc: Gets all widgets in the container

methods.name: GetChildAt
GetChildIndex
methods.doc: Gets the index of a specific child widget

methods.name: GetChildrenCount
methods.doc: Gets number of child widgets in the container.

methods.name: HasAnyChildren
methods.doc: Returns true if there are any child widgets in the panel

methods.name: HasChild
methods.doc: Returns true if panel contains this widget

methods.name: RemoveChild
methods.doc:
Removes a specific widget from the container.
@return true if the widget was found and removed.

methods.name: RemoveChildAt
methods.doc: Removes a child by it's index.
